translations: 无一定方向（或目的）地（amorphous 的变体）

sentences.sentence: Many of the three-dimensional works are displayed on a series of large, amorphously shaped islands that resemble flat-topped, pale yellow sand dunes.Initially this seems odd.
sentences.translation: 立体艺术品多数都陈列在一连串巨大的形状各异的展台上，这些展台很像是淡黄色的平顶沙丘，这一布置起先看上去很怪。
